publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2160 Mrs Mary Mulligan: West Lothian Council Investor in People Award—That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on receiving an Investor in People award, the first local authority in Scotland to do so across its whole service, and recognises that this investment in the 7500 staff it employs results in a better service for the people of West Lothian. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick*

S1M-2160 Mrs Mary Mulligan: West Lothian Council Investor in People Award-That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on receiving an Investor in People award, the first local authority in Scotland to do so across its whole service, and recognises that this investment in the 7500 staff it employs results in a better service for the people of West Lothian. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick
S1M-2160 West Lothian Council Investor in People Award (lodged on 4 September 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-2160 West Lothian Council Investor in People Award (lodged on 4 September 2001) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Elaine Smith*

S1M-2160 Mrs Mary Mulligan: West Lothian Council Investor in People Award—That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on receiving an Investor in People award, the first local authority in Scotland to do so across its whole service, and recognises that this investment in the 7500 staff it employs results in a better service for the people of West Lothian. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Elaine Smith
S1M-2160 West Lothian Council Investor in People Award (lodged on 4 September 2001) Irene Oldfather*

S1M-2160 Mrs Mary Mulligan: West Lothian Council Investor in People Award-That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on receiving an Investor in People award, the first local authority in Scotland to do so across its whole service, and recognises that this investment in the 7500 staff it employs results in a better service for the people of West Lothian. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Elaine Smith, Irene Oldfather, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2160 West Lothian Council Investor in People Award (lodged on 4 September 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-2160 Mrs Mary Mulligan: West Lothian Council Investor in People Award-That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on receiving an Investor in People award, the first local authority in Scotland to do so across its whole service, and recognises that this investment in the 7500 staff it employs results in a better service for the people of West Lothian. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Elaine Smith, Irene Oldfather, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Jamie Stone
